message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $10,000. I believe it offers exceptional value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $9,000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but the product's value is quite high for me. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $9,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to counter with $9,200 for the product. This price aligns better with my budget while still recognizing the value of the item.
